channel.title: Webclient help (JarMaker)
channel.description:
Hi, this only a few steps and Ive tried it nearly 20 times so i decided id post what im doing to you smart folks :) I tried posting everything clearly [b][i]if you see anything im doing wrong or have any feedback at all it is greatly appreciated[/i][/b] by the way im using the "Webclient tutorials" found at the top of this section [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,535370.0.html]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,535370.0.html[/url]
[i]1) I set the output file to where i wanted the client to be .jar'd to.
2)I changed the application.jar to client.jar. at the top right
3) I set the Input File selection to the first page where my .classes are, its the same page as the run.bat I'm using Project Insanity.
4)I hit the Manifest Template and changed the main class to "client". And this is the info for my run.bat (aka) how i found the main class "client" [code] @echo off TITLE Client
start javaW -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/code]
5) I set the manifest, and create the .jar, I get a pop-up window that says it was created successfully
6) I open the finished client.jar file and i get a blank white screen that i cant close :( [/i]

no help received yet Upping the payment to $20 Thanks !

change the main class set as client to Gui.

:3

Could not find Main class : Gui Program will exit

@ I Am Beast, Ill change them all now thank-you
[/quote]

start javaW -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32
See what I’m talking about? It clearly says Gui right there.[/quote]

Yeah i see what your saying but it wont work. Im pretty fed up with this im gonna go back to the java books for a week or so. Thanks for replys

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help (JarMaker)
item.dc:creator: @Nelson_x Nelson_x
item.description:
@Nelson_x wrote:

[quote=“mickie456, post:3, topic:437735”][quote author=XxAndyxX link=topic=540435.msg3957800#msg3957800 date=1332944843]
Hi, this only a few steps and Ive tried it nearly 20 times so i decided id post what im doing to you smart folks I tried posting everything clearly if you see anything im doing wrong or have any feedback at all it is greatly appreciated by the way im using the “Webclient tutorials” found at the top of this section https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,535370.0.html

[i]1) I set the output file to where i wanted the client to be .jar’d to.

2)I changed the application.jar to client.jar. at the top right

  1. I set the Input File selection to the first page where my .classes are, its the same page as the run.bat I’m using Project Insanity.

4)I hit the Manifest Template and changed the main class to “client”. And this is the info for my run.bat (aka) how i found the main class “client”

[code]
@echo off
TITLE Client

start javaW -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32
exit[/code]

  1. I set the manifest, and create the .jar, I get a pop-up window that says it was created successfully

  2. I open the finished client.jar file and i get a blank white screen that i cant close
    [/i]

Edit: I will pay you $10.00 to help me make the Webclient and put on site! please don’t act like you know what your doing unless you actually do!
[/quote]
ill do it skype :mickie6503
did it for few others

i can rep this guy <3 :)[/quote]

Read full topic

4)I hit the Manifest Template and changed the main class to “client”. And this is the info for my run.bat (aka) how i found the main class “client”

[code]

exit[/code]

    [/i]
